Hong Jeong-ho (Hangul: 홍정호, born 12 August 1989) is a South Korean football player who plays for 1. Bundesliga side FC Augsburg.
His brother Hong Jeong-nam is also a footballer.

people.name: Mario Balotelli
people.aboutText:
Mario Barwuah Balotelli (Italian pronunciation: [ˈmaːrjo baloˈtɛlli]; born Mario Barwuah; 12 August 1990) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a striker for A.C. Milan, on loan from Liverpool, and the Italy national team.
He started his professional football career at Lumezzane and played for the first team twice before having an unsuccessful trial at Barcelona, and subsequently joining Inter Milan in 2007. Inter manager Roberto Mancini brought Balotelli into the first team, but when Mancini left, Balotelli's disciplinary record fell away.

people.name: Enzo Pineda
people.aboutText: Enrico Lorenzo Macam Pineda, better known by his screen name Enzo Pineda (born August 12, 1990 in Quezon City, Philippines), is a finalist in the fifth season of GMA Network's StarStruck V.

people.name: Marvin Zeegelaar
people.aboutText: Marvin Romeo Kwasie Zeegelaar (born 12 August 1990) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays for Sporting Clube de Portugal as a left back or a left midfielder.

people.name: Martin Zurawsky
people.aboutText:
Martin Zurawsky (born 12 August 1990 in Lauchhammer) is a German footballer who currently plays for BFC Dynamo.
Zurawsky made his professional debut during the 2010–11 3. Fußball-Liga season for Jahn Regensburg as a substitute for Mahmut Temür in a 2–1 away win over Carl Zeiss Jena.

people.name: Jesinta Campbell
people.aboutText: Jesinta Campbell (born 12 August 1991) is an Australian actress, fashion model, TV Host and beauty pageant titleholder who won Miss Universe Australia 2010 and represented Australia at Miss Universe 2010 and placed 2nd Runner-Up.

people.name: Cara Delevingne
people.aboutText: Cara Jocelyn Delevingne (/ˈkɑːrə dɛləˈviːn/ KAH-rə del-ə-veen; born 12 August 1992) is an English fashion model and actress. She signed with Storm Model Management after leaving school in 2009. Delevingne won the "Model of the Year" award at the British Fashion Awards in 2012 and 2014 and has appeared in shows for houses including Burberry, Mulberry, Dolce & Gabbana, and Jason Wu.

people.name: Isabella Escobar
people.aboutText:
Teo Gheorghiu is a Swiss-Canadian pianist and actor, born on August 12, 1992 in Männedorf in Canton of Zürich, Switzerland from Romanian and Canadian parents.
^ Andrew Littlejohn (2008-10-30). "I need to get my energy out somehow!".

people.name: Teo Gheorghiu
people.aboutText:
Isabella Escobar (born 12 August 1992) is a Guatemalan tennis player. Since her debut for the Guatemala Fed Cup team in 2009, Escobar has a 2–4 record in international competition.
^ "Isabella Escobar Profile".

people.name: Jacob Loko
people.aboutText: Park Sun-young (born August 12, 1993), better known by her stage name Luna (Hangul: 루나), is a South Korean singer, actress and presenter. She is the main vocalist and lead dancer of K-pop girl group f(x).

people.name: Luna
people.aboutText: Jacob Loko (born 12 August 1992) is an Australian rugby league player who currently signed for the Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs in the National Rugby League (NRL) competition. Loko is of Fijian and Tongan descent.

people.name: Rodrigo Alborno
people.aboutText: Ewa Farna (born 12 August 1993) is a Polish-Czech pop-rock singer. Farna released three studio albums with Czech lyrics, which sold platinum in the Czech Republic and were later re-recorded and released with Polish lyrics. Farna is the youngest commercially successful singer in the Czech Republic.

people.name: Ewa Farna
people.aboutText: Rodrigo Alborno Ortega (born 12 August 1993) is a Paraguayan footballer who plays as a left back or left winger.

people.name: Imani Hakim
people.aboutText: Imani Hakim (born August 12, 1993) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Tonya Rock on the UPN/CW sitcom Everybody Hates Chris as well as portraying Olympic gold medalist Gabrielle Douglas in the 2014 Lifetime original movie The Gabby Douglas Story.

people.name: Bex Taylor-Klaus
people.aboutText: Bex Taylor-Klaus (born August 12, 1994) is an American actress.

people.name: Torri Webster
people.aboutText: Torri Webster (born August 12, 1996) is a Canadian actress, best known for her starring role as Tess Foster in the YTV teen sitcom Life with Boys, which earned her the Young Artist Award for Best Leading Young Actress in a TV Series.
